Class MetricsMvcEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.mvc.AbstractEndpointMvcAdapter<Endpoint<?>>

        • org.springframework.boot.actuate.endpoint.mvc.MetricsMvcEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MvcEndpoint, NamedMvcEndpoint

    @ConfigurationProperties(prefix="endpoints.metrics")
public class MetricsMvcEndpoint
extends EndpointMvcAdapter
    Adapter to expose MetricsEndpoint as an MvcEndpoint.
    Author:
    Dave Syer, Andy Wilkinson, Sergei Egorov
